ProductInfo.Features:
Bright 32-in 1,366 x 768p HD LCD display for improved outdoor viewing
Anti-reflective protective glass reduces glare, increases contrasts and protects LCD screen from damage
Powder-coated aluminum housing protects internal components from weathering effects such as rain, humidity and dust
Multi-fan airflow system keeps unit cool and dry in temperatures up to 122 Degrees F
Internal thermostatically controlled heater protects TV from freezing in temperatures as low as -40 Degrees F
ProductInfo.Name: Factory-Reconditioned SunBriteTV SB-3220HD-WH-R Pro Series 32 in. 1080i 60 Hz LCD Full-HD True Outdoor All-Weather TV (White)
